errors.organisationSurnameFirstNameValidationEr: "Corporate name of company or organisation" field or "Surname" and "Name" fields must be completed. Both alternatives are not allowed
errors.jurisdictionValidationError: One of the fields 3.1-3.8 must be selected
errors.crossborderNatureValidationError: At least two of the lists must refer to different States
errors.IBANValidationError: IBAN validation failure. Do not forget to include the 2 digit country code at the beginning of the sequence
errors.amountValidationError: Invalid entry. Please use the XXX.XXX,XX format when entering an amount
errors.dateValidationError: You have provided an end date that is before a start date. Please review your criterion
errors.emailValidationError: Field has an invalid e-mail address
errors.phoneNumberValidationError: Field contains invalid characters. Please use only numbers, spaces and the "+" character

claimant.title: 1. Claimant
claimant.addAnotherClaimantText: If you'd like to add another party and/or representative, please click on the item that corresponds to the associated parties and/or their representatives.
claimant.organisation: 1.1. Corporate name of company or organisation
claimant.identificationCode: 1.2. Personal identification number or passport number/registration number
claimant.representative: 1.8. Claimant’s representative, if any, and contact details
claimant.representativeOrganisation: Corporate name of company or organisation
claimant.representativeIdentificationCode: Personal identification number or passport number/registration number

defendant.title: 2. Defendant
defendant.addAnotherDefendantText: If you'd like to add another party and/or representative, please click on the item that corresponds to the associated parties and/or their representatives.
defendant.organisation: 2.1. Corporate name of company or organisation
defendant.identificationCode: 2.2. Personal identification number or passport number/registration number
defendant.representative: 2.8. Defendant’s representative, if any, and contact details
defendant.representativeOrganisation: Corporate name of company or organisation
defendant.representativeIdentificationCode: Personal identification number or passport number/registration number

jurisdiction.title: 3. Jurisdiction
jurisdiction.question: 3. On what ground do you consider the court/tribunal to have jurisdiction?
jurisdiction.policyholderDomicilie: 3.3. Domicile of the policyholder, the insured or the beneficiary in insurance matters
jurisdiction.placePerformanceObbligation: 3.4. Place of performance of the obligation in question
jurisdiction.placeImmovableProperty: 3.6. Place where the immovable property is situated
jurisdiction.choiceCourtTribunal: 3.7. Choice of court/tribunal agreed by the parties

crossborderNature.title: 4.1. Cross-border nature of the case
crossborderNature.claimantCountry: 4.1.1. Country of domicile or habitual residence of claimant
crossborderNature.defendantCountry: 4.1.2. Country of domicile or habitual residence of defendant

bankDetails.title: 4.2. Bank details (optional)
bankDetails.applicationFeePaymentQuestion: 4.2.1. How will you pay the application fee?
bankDetails.directDebit: Direct debit from your bank account
bankDetails.bicOrBankName: Bank name, BIC or other relevant bank code
bankDetails.claimantBankAccountQuestion: 4.2.2. To which account do you wish the defendant to pay any amount claimed or awarded?
bankDetails.claimantBicOrBankName: 4.2.2.2. Bank name, BIC or other relevant bank code

claim.title: 5. Claim
claim.claimForMoneyExplanation: Are you claiming money? If so, click "Yes".
claim.principalAmount: 5.1.1. Amount of principal (excluding interest and costs)
claim.otherClaimExplanation: Is your claim non-monetary? If so click "Yes".
claim.claimDescription: 5.2.1. Please specify what you are claiming
claim.claimingCostProceedings: 5.3. Are you claiming the costs of proceedings?
claim.costsDetails: 5.3.1. If yes, please specify which costs and indicate the amount claimed or incurred so far
claim.percentagePointsAboveECBInfo: Please provide the number of the percentage points above ECB interest rate: e.g. when ECB rate is 4% and you claim 5 % interest – insert "1".
claim.aboveTheBaseRate: above the base rate of the ECB
claim.toJudgmentDate: to the date of the judgment
claim.toPrincipalPaymentDate: to the date of payment of principal
claim.ifStatutory: 5.4.2. If statutory, the interest should run from (date)
claim.claimingInterestOnCost: 5.5. Are you claiming interest on costs?
claim.claimingInterestOnCostFromDate: If yes, the interest should run from (date)
claim.toCostsPaymentDate: to the date of payment of costs

claimDetails.title: 6. Details of claim
claimDetails.detailsOfClaim: 6.1. Please give reasons for your claim, for example what happened, where and when.
claimDetails.evidenceDescription: 6.2. Please describe the evidence you wish to put forward to support your claim and state which points of the claim it supports. Where appropriate, you should add relevant supporting documents.

oralHearing.title: 7.1. Oral hearing
oralHearing.oralHearingRequest: 7.1.1. Do you want an oral hearing to be held?
oralHearing.oralHearingPresence: 7.1.2. If the court decides to hold an oral hearing, do you want to be physically present?

documentAndCommunication.title: 7.2. Service of documents and communication with the court
documentAndCommunication.electronicCommunicationWithCourtTribunal: 7.2.1. Do you agree to the use of electronic means of communication for the service of the response by the defendant, any counterclaim and the judgment?
documentAndCommunication.electronicCommunicationOther: 7.2.2. Do you agree to the use of electronic means of communication to receive written communications other than the documents mentioned in point 7.2.1.?

certificate.title: 7.3. Certificate
certificate.certificateRequest: 7.3.1. I ask the court/tribunal to issue a certificate concerning the judgment
certificate.language: 7.3.2. I ask the court/tribunal to issue a certificate in another language than the language of the court proceedings, in particular:
certificate.languageInfo: Upon your request the court may provide you with the certificate in another language, by making use of the dynamic forms available through the European e-Justice Portal. This may be helpful in enforcement of the judgment in another Member State. Please note, that the court is not obliged to provide any translation or transliteration of a text entered in the free-text fields of the certificate.

dateAndSignature.title: 7.4. Date and signature
dateAndSignature.request: I hereby request that the court/tribunal give a judgment against the defendant on the basis of my claim.
dateAndSignature.declaration: I declare that the information provided is true to the best of my knowledge and is given in good faith.
dateAndSignature.sign: Name of the person signing the form

court.title: 8. Court/tribunal
court.question: 8. Before which court/tribunal are you making your claim
court.name: 8.2. Name

unitedKingdomModal: As of 1 January 2021, the United Kingdom is no longer an EU Member State. However, in the field of civil justice, pending procedures and proceedings initiated before the end of the transition period will continue under EU law. Until the end of 2024, the United Kingdom can continue to be selected in online (dynamic) forms for the purpose of these proceedings and procedures. An exception to this rule are the Public documents forms, in which the UK should not be selected.
